entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
